text: Dhawan is an Bari Khatri caste. which ethically quilled among lower or _peasant confinement_ tied up under Indian varna system, due to their customary disbeliefs while grooming among the Arora kinship. However of they among redundant trader who take asylum in Patiala state after loosing their homeland at Rohtas and become the segmental enforcer under "Arya Samaj" to moderating their lower status in dominant Jat society. == Related pages == * Varna (Hinduism) * Khatri Chhetri * Jat caste * caste == References == Category:Castes
title: Dhawan (caste)
